definitions.definition: A paved outside area, adjoining a house, used for dining or recreation .
An inner courtyard typical of traditional houses in some regions of Spain .
examples: The flat looks out on a patio on one side and a churro café on the other.

main_definition: A paved outside area, adjoining a house, used for dining or recreation .
secondary_definitions: An inner courtyard typical of traditional houses in some regions of Spain .
